018package org.opengis.filter;
019
020import java.util.Optional;
021import org.opengis.util.ControlledVocabulary;
022import org.opengis.annotation.UML;
023
024import static org.opengis.annotation.Obligation.CONDITIONAL;
025import static org.opengis.annotation.Specification.ISO_19143;
026
027
028/**
029 * The action to do for selecting a new version for an identified resource.
030 * This is one of the possible values of {@link Version}.
031 *
032 * @author  Martin Desruisseaux (Geomatys)
033 * @version 3.1
034 * @since   3.1
035 */
036@UML(identifier="VersionAction", specification=ISO_19143)
037public enum VersionAction implements ControlledVocabulary {
038    /**
039     * Filter selects the first version of a resource.
040     */
041    @UML(identifier="first", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19143)
042    FIRST("first"),
043
044    /**
045     * Filter selects the most recent version of a resource.
046     */
047    @UML(identifier="last", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19143)
048    LAST("last"),
049
050    /**
051     * Filter selects the previous version of a resource relative to the version
052     * specified using the {@code identifier} attribute.
053     */
054    @UML(identifier="previous", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19143)
055    PREVIOUS("previous"),
056
057    /**
058     * Filter selects the next version of a resource relative to the version
059     * specified using the {@code identifier} attribute.
060     */
061    @UML(identifier="next", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19143)
062    NEXT("next"),
063
064    /**
065     * Filters selects all available versions of a resource.
066     */
067    @UML(identifier="all", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19143)
068    ALL("all");
069
070    /**
071     * The UML identifier.
072     */
073    private final String identifier;
074
075    /**
076     * Creates a new constant with the given UML identifier.
077     *
078     * @param identifier  the UML identifier.
079     */
080    private VersionAction(final String identifier) {
081        this.identifier = identifier;
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * Returns the UML identifier for this enumeration constant.
086     */
087    @Override
088    public Optional<String> identifier() {
089        return Optional.ofNullable(identifier);
090    }
091
092    /**
093     * Returns all constants defined by this enumeration type.
094     * Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking {@link #values()}, except that this
095     * method can be invoked on an instance of the {@code ControlledVocabulary} interface
096     * (i.e. the enumeration type does not need to be known at compile-time).
097     *
098     * @return all {@linkplain #values() values} for this enumeration.
099     */
100    @Override
101    public VersionAction[] family() {
102        return values();
103    }
104}
